title: Female Monster champion concept
body:
I was really fond of CilviaMirell's idea for a female void champion (here the link to her thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/IEdUBWta-my-female-void-champion-designs)

but I felt like league needs a terrifying female monster

so I made this doodle of a concept I had inspired by a neat centipede I had found online

http://th01.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/i/2014/226/8/e/female_void_creature_concept_by_kyrin21-d7v6b6u.jpg

again, shoutout to CilviaMirell for the inspiration

edit: a little bit of info into some of the thought behind it. I originally want to make the design kind of reptileish, but then i figured it would be to similar to the zerg if it was to fleshy. So i decided o make the blades around her head have kind of a corbra esc look to them. Also I made the colors really dull cause while looking up spiders I read that female spiders are generally larger while males are smaller with colorful stripes or spots. So I made the design really big and the colors dull because its the color of the males that should attract the female

edit:
http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/226/7/9/c_by_kyrin21-d7v6x44.jpg 
some additional color schemes to make her feel more void-like

But I have to disagree with your idea of making a void champion an ant, wasp, moth, etc

obviously those can be associated with something female (ants and wasps have queens, and moths are generally considered more feminant) but I think its more interesting to have something that wouldn't necessarily be feminant and use that for such a design. Its a fun way to break from stereotyping female characters

The main reason I choose those species is that as they most likely become the only champ for their tribe (don't think riot would make an other cho'gat or kah'zix species for exemple),  the fact that it is a female who is send to this world must be because the female version is much stronger than the male version.

For the ant, a queen who come to lead the void creature had some sense since it's the only insect who as that kind of hierarchy.
For wasp, it's basically because it's the most dangerous insect for human beeing (put aside mosquito), bring it in runeterra is a good move for a void invasion and the female are more agressives.

Or she injects eggs into a target, damaging them over time. If they die with the eggs in them, they leave a whole bunch of babies behind!

Really badass artwork, even if it doesn't really look "Void", which is mostly due to the coloring. The Void tends to have more unearthly colors -  Kha'Zix, Malzahar, &Kassadin are primarily purple, Cho'Gath has purple with the red like an adult crustacean, Kog'Maw sort of has the coloring of juvenile crustaceans, and Vel'Koz is also mostly purple though has a large amount of gold to sort of show he's a "transcendent" Voidborn. If the tan was purple or black with the brownish-red pulsing purple or green or something, I think it'd definitely look more Void-like.

I'm curious if you have an lore and kit ideas for this. I would love to see what you have in mind for such a beast.
